faq.question: What is Localzon(e)?
faq.answer: Localzon(e) is place where you can find local groceries.

answer.desktop:
On the top right you can search for products.
Based on your location we will suggest you places where you can buy these local products.
answer.mobile:
On the top right you will find a button to open the navigation bar. Once clicked a green button will appear. Click it and search for your products.
Based on your location we will suggest you places where you can buy these local products.
